title: Ashton Kutcher is proud papa as he runs errands with Wyatt, five, and Dimitri, two, in Beverly Hills
text:
He was out running errands in Beverly Hills on Tuesday.

And Ashton Kutcher proved he's the perfect papa by taking his adorable daughter Wyatt, five, and son Dimitri, two, with him. Wyatt, who mostly held her 41-year-old dad's hand, looked cute in a pink flowery dress with her brunette hair styled in two plaits.

There was no sign of his wife, 36-year-old Bad Moms actress Mila Kunis.

Devoted dad: Ashton Kutcher took daughter Wyatt, five, and son Dimitri, two, with him when he ran errands in Beverly Hills on Tuesday

Dimitri proved to be a bit more of a handful, running around as Ashton tried to hold on to him. The little blonde wore a yellow T-shirt and pale blue joggers.

Ashton was casually dressed for his trip out in a black sweatshirt, matching sweat pants and black sneakers with a white cap over his hair.

It comes after the release of Demi Moore's memoir, which included many claims about former husband Ashton.

Corralling his kids: Wyatt held her 41-year-old dad's hand, but Dimitri, two, seemed reluctant

He was married to the Ghost actress, 56, from 2005 until their divorce was finalized in 2013.

In her book, Demi accuses him of cheating twice, and revealed they had two threesomes.

The actress insisted she had warned her ex about the book's content, telling Ellen DeGeneres, 'I have, yes. I tried to keep the perspective on my story.'

Petal power: Wyatt looked cute in a pink flowery dress with her brunette hair in two plaits

New love: Baseball fans Ashton and Mila Kunis, who tied the knot on July 4, 2015, took in the game between the Los Angeles Dodgers and the Colorado Rockies on September 21

In a statement to UsWeekly earlier this month, a spokesman for Ashton said: 'He had a heads up on what is in the book.

'He's not mad or disappointed. This is Demi's truth, and he always felt sympathetic toward her.'

Meanwhile, Ashton can next be seen in The Long Home, which is expected out on January 1.

The way they were: Ashton and then wife Demi Moore at an event in 2011 in NYC. She has recently dished the dirt on their eight-year marriage, which ended in 2013, in her book

Directed by and co-starring James Franco, it's about a young contractor who is hired to build a honky-tonk in Tennessee by the man who killed his father.

Mila has Breaking News In Yuba County coming out the same day.

She plays Nancy who catches her husband in bed with another woman, causing him to die of a heart attack. She buries his body and takes advantage of the growing celebrity status that comes from having a missing husband.
